actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill relating to abandonment of mining claims.

summary.text: Provides that if the owner of an unpatented lode or placer mining claim shall fail, within the three-year period following the date of the enactment of this Act, to file for record either (1) a notice of intention to hold the mining claims; (2) an affidavit of assessment work performed thereon; or (3) a detailed report provided for by the Act of September 2, 1958 relating thereto, such failure shall constitute the abandonment of the mining claim by the owner.

titles.title: A bill relating to abandonment of mining claims.
